biography: Franco-American screenwriter and novelist Mirabelle Kirkland writes in both languages: Our Dear Neighbors, Josephine Guardian Angel, and the Spencer, Gawayn, and Plankton invasion TV-series. She has written and directed two short films Nouvelles d'angelique (2005) and Les couillus (2007) for Avalon Films, now developing an original comedy series for Véma Productions. Mirabelle is a well-known voice-over actress. Spoken languages: French (native), English (native), Spanish (spoken), German (notions), Serbe (notions).
name: Mirabelle Kirkland
